name: LIGHTNING INDIA FOUNDATION FOR EXCELLENCE

address: Old Ryan Public School, Jarothi Road Girdhari Nager,

briefDescription: Lightning India Foundation For Excellence works towards harnessing the skills and capabilities of the Indian youth so they have the right and adequate skills to perform the job assigned to them. Our efforts are being made in mobilizing, new training methodologies of skilling and doing industry linkages for placing rural youth. It is in this context that the role of Skill Development organizations becomes vital.
